Uses of Class
util.SimilarityScoreParts

  • Packages that use SimilarityScoreParts 
    Package Description
    dsm.parameters  

    • Uses of SimilarityScoreParts in dsm.parameters

      Methods in dsm.parameters that return SimilarityScoreParts 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static <V> SimilarityScoreParts VecSim.calculateSimilarityByRelation(java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> word1Map, java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> word2Map, java.lang.Double vectorMean1, java.lang.Double vectorMean2, long numberOfAllFeatures, java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> informationMap)
      This function calculates the numerical and Lin similarity of the feature vectors @param word1Map and @param word2Map (without normalization), with respect to one type of features, so @param word1Map and @param word2Map consists of features of only one type.
      static <V> SimilarityScoreParts VecSim.calculateSimilarityByRelationForDoubleZeroValuesToo(java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> word1Map, java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> word2Map, java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Long> featureMap, java.lang.Double vectorMean1, java.lang.Double vectorMean2, long numberOfAllFeatures, java.util.HashMap<V,java.lang.Double> informationMap)
      This function calculates the numerical similarity of the feature vectors @param word1Map and @param word2Map (without normalization), with respect to one type of features (so @param word1Map and @param word2Map consists of features of only one type), in case of such similarity measures, where the calculation should take place even if (d1==0 && d2==0).
      Methods in dsm.parameters with parameters of type SimilarityScoreParts 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static double VecSim.calculateFinalSimilarityScore(java.lang.String word1, java.lang.String word2, SimilarityScoreParts similarityScoreParts1, SimilarityScoreParts similarityScoreParts2, SimilarityScoreParts similarityScoreParts3, SimilarityScoreParts similarityScoreParts4, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> wordFrequencies, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorElementSums, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorElementAbsValueSums, java.util.HashMap<java.lang.String,java.lang.Double> vectorLengthSquares, long numberOfAllFeatures, long allWordTypeCount)
      Calculates the final similarity score for two words based on the similarity score parts, the length of the vectors and the vector element sums.
